```{r setup}
#Loading packages
library(tidyverse)
library(viridis)

#Load data
df <- read_csv("us-counties.csv") %>% 
  filter(state == "Washington",
         county != "Unknown") %>% 
  select(-c(fips, state))

```



```{r graphic}
df %>% 
  group_by(date) %>% 
  summarise(cases = sum(cases),
            deaths = sum(deaths)) %>%
  mutate(county = "agg") %>% 
  bind_rows(df) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(date, deaths, group = county)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(~county)

```
